description: Try our easy to follow Speedy Sausage Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Speedy Sausage Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Use a slotted spoon to transfer broccoli to pan with sausages. Drain pasta and add to frying pan along with remaining oil and lemon juice. Season to taste with pepper, then stir over medium heat for 1-2 minutes or until heated through. Serve topped with basil and grated parmesan.
